      • checkForFile

        public boolean checkForFile(java.lang.String file)
        Check if given file exists. If it dowsn't, create it.
        Parameters:
        file - String with full path and nameof file to check
        Returns:
        boolean True if it exists or it was successfully created, false if it doesn't
